panels.description: Shows rate of handled Unary gRPC requests from queriers.
panels.title: Rate

panels.description: Shows ratio of errors compared to the total number of handled requests from queriers.

targets.expr: sum by (job) (rate(grpc_server_handled_total{grpc_code=~"Unknown|ResourceExhausted|Internal|Unavailable|DataLoss",job=~"$job", grpc_type="unary"}[$interval])) / sum by (job) (rate(grpc_server_handled_total{job=~"$job", grpc_type="unary"}[$interval]))

panels.title: Errors

panels.description: Shows how long has it taken to handle requests from queriers, in quantiles.
panels.title: Duration

panels.description: Shows rate of handled Streamed gRPC requests from queriers.
panels.title: Rate

targets.expr: sum by (job) (rate(grpc_server_handled_total{grpc_code=~"Unknown|ResourceExhausted|Internal|Unavailable|DataLoss",job=~"$job", grpc_type="server_stream"}[$interval])) / sum by (job) (rate(grpc_server_handled_total{job=~"$job", grpc_type="server_stream"}[$interval]))

panels.description: Shows how long has it taken to handle requests from queriers, in quantiles.
panels.title: Duration

panels.description: Shows the relative time of last successful upload to the object-store bucket.
panels.title: Successful Upload
